rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 25 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 5:00 PM, 20 July 2025(Sunday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Bataan, Pampanga and Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, Castillejos, San Marcelino, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe, Botolan, Cabangan).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate rains over Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas and Rizal within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Tarlac, Bulacan, Nueva Ecija and Zambales(Candelaria, Iba, Masinloc, Palauig, Santa Cruz) which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Watch #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:00 AM, 20 July 2025



Thunderstorm is MORE LIKELY to develop over Greater Metro Manila Area(Metro Manila, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna and Cavite) within 12 hours. 



All are advised to continue monitoring for updates.
